wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile)             <h3 class="article-list__heading">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/are-you-prepared-its-ohio-severe-weather-awareness-week/">
                 Are you prepared? It’s Ohio Severe Weather Awareness Week
                </a>
               </h4>
              </div>
              <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/are-you-prepared-its-ohio-severe-weather-awareness-week/">
                <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                 <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458052">
                  <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="" src="https://i0.wp.com/fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2015/06/june18skygreen.jpg?w=2000&amp;ssl=1" srcset=""/>
                 </div>
                 <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                  <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                   <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                    <defs>
                     <style>
                      .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                     </style>
                    </defs>
                    <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                    </path>
                   </svg>
                  </span>
                  <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">

                  </span>

                </div>
               </a>
              </figure>
             </article>

            <h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/sports/covid-19-upsets-add-to-madness-at-ncaa-tournament/">
                 COVID-19, upsets add to madness at NCAA Tournament
                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                   </style>
                  </defs>
                  <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">

         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Soak in that sunshine: String of warmer days continues" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://fox8.com/weather/soak-in-that-sunshine-string-of-warmer-days-continues/">
            Soak in that sunshine: String of warmer days continues
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-2" data-link-label="Weather" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://fox8.com/weather/">

         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/ym0.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://fox8.com/weather/soak-in-that-sunshine-string-of-warmer-days-continues/">
           <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
            <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6457855">

              </a>
             </h3>
            </div>

             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/video/its-ohio-severe-weather-awareness-week/6458052/">

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/video/hasbro-asks-for-publics-help-in-updating-monopolys-community-chest-cards/6457670/">
               Hasbro asks for public's help in updating Monopoly's Community Chest cards
              </a>
             </h3>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/video/hasbro-asks-for-publics-help-in-updating-monopolys-community-chest-cards/6457670/">

               </div>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                   </style>
                  </defs>
                  <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>
          </div>
         </section>
        </section>
        <!-- Video center -->

           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["1:1","50px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/coronavirus/ohio-nears-1-million-mark-in-total-confirmed-covid-19-cases/">
              Ohio nears 1 million mark in total COVID-19 cases
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/coronavirus/">
              Coronavirus
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-21T17:23:29-04:00">
              3 hours ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/coronavirus/ohio-nears-1-million-mark-in-total-confirmed-covid-19-cases/">

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Missing
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1354437" data-collection="article-list4" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list4" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/missing/medina-police-ask-for-publics-help-in-search-for-10-year-old-boy/">
                Medina police ask for public’s help in search for 10-year-old boy
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/missing/">
                Missing
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-19T18:25:38-04:00">
                2 days ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/missing/medina-police-ask-for-publics-help-in-search-for-10-year-old-boy/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper portrait">
                 <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px" src="https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=376&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=180&amp;h=320&amp;crop=1 180w, https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=360&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1 360w, https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=376&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1 540w, https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=376&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1 720w, https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=376&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1 1080w, https://fox8.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2021/03/Medina-boy.jpg?w=376&amp;h=500&amp;crop=1 1440w"/>
                </div>
               </div>
              </a>
             </figure>
            </article>

           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Sports
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1354988" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/sports/indians-send-struggling-outfielder-oscar-mercado-to-minors/">
                Indians send struggling outfielder Óscar Mercado to minors
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox8.com/sports/">
                Sports
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T15:26:22-04:00">
                5 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/sports/indians-send-struggling-outfielder-oscar-mercado-to-minors/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape">

           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list7" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/coronavirus/a-rapid-covid-19-vaccine-rollout-backfired-in-some-us-states/">
              A rapid COVID-19 vaccine rollout backfired in some US states
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox8.com/news/coronavirus/">
              Coronavirus
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-21T12:42:10-04:00">
              8 hours ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">

        <h2 class="widget-title">
         continue reading override
        </h2>

       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-18">
        <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--sidebar" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="articleListCarousel" data-context="carousel_sidebar">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
          Remarkable Women
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1344279" data-collection="article-list9" data-index="0">
